entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
